com.jde.view.sprites

Class SpriteSheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.view.sprites.SpriteSheet

  • public class SpriteSheet
extends java.lang.Object
    This SpriteSheet contains a texture used to extract and draw sprites
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String file
      File name of the PNG source
      protected boolean loaded
      Becomes true when sheet is succesfully loaded
      protected org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture texture
      OpenGL texture of the sheet

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpriteSheet(java.lang.String file)
      Basic constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(int displayListId)
      This method draws a sprite from this sheet, and loads the sheet the first time is called
      int getDisplayListId(double x, double y, double w, double h, double scaling)
      This method compiles and return the display list ID for a certain sprite inside the sheet, given its coordinates
      void preload()
      This method loads the spritesheet into OpenGL as a texture from the PNG file

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpriteSheet

        public SpriteSheet(java.lang.String file)
        Basic constructor
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(int displayListId)
        This method draws a sprite from this sheet, and loads the sheet the first time is called
        Parameters:
        displayListId - Display list ID number of the sprite

      • getDisplayListId

        public int getDisplayListId(double x,
                   double y,
                   double w,
                   double h,
                   double scaling)
        This method compiles and return the display list ID for a certain sprite inside the sheet, given its coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - Top left X-axis coordinate of the sprite in the sheet
        y - Top left Y-axis coordinate of the sprite in the sheet
        w - Sprite width in the sheet
        h - Sprite height in the sheet
        scaling - Scale factor
        Returns:
        The new display list ID of a sprite

      • preload

        public void preload()
        This method loads the spritesheet into OpenGL as a texture from the PNG file
